name: Electro Punch
description:
In Electro Punch, you play as Zedd, a mecha-human who has two batteries connected to his fists. Problem: they are damaged and he is constantly losing energy!

Hurry up! Hit everything in your path with the right color to recharge his fists!

Go through all the levels at high speed and try to unlock all the fist colors by finishing with the best time possible!

-- How to play --

Download the .zip/.rar and extract the files

Launch ElectroPunch.exe from the game folder

Enjoy !
